summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear largely implemented by expanding the brutal quote pools in both backend and frontend. However, the diff introduces an unrequested backend migration module and wiring, plus updates to repo metadata/state files, which violate stated constraints/non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a backend migration module and wired it into the main canister, despite the non-goal of not creating/requiring a backend migration and the constraint to keep Motoko logic in backend/main.mo.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to create/require a backend migration and to keep Motoko logic in backend/main.mo; the diff adds backend/migration.mo and imports/uses it from backend/main.mo.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project/repo meta documentation/state files not requested by the BuildRequest (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requests quote library expansion in backend/main.mo and frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendDialog.tsx; meta/state file updates are out of scope.
